# MarshalStream.BufferedReadableBytes property

Provides access to the unread part of the read buffer.

```csharp
public ReadOnlyMemory<byte> BufferedReadableBytes { get; }
```

## Exceptions

| exception | condition |
| --- | --- |
| ObjectDisposedException | The stream is disposed. |
